name: XML
semantic_context: Convert data from and to XML
natural_language_description: 这是 XML 节点。主要用于: Convert data from and to XML

mode.name: mode
mode.description: From and to what format the data should be converted
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 作用: From and to what format the data should be converted | 默认值: xmlToJson
available_options: JSON to XML (值: jsonToxml) - Converts data from JSON to XML
XML to JSON (值: xmlToJson) - Converts data from XML to JSON

xmlNotice.displayName: If your XML is inside a binary file, use the 'Extract from File' node to convert it to text first
xmlNotice.name: xmlNotice
xmlNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: If your XML is inside a binary file, use the 'Extract from File' node to convert it to text first

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the property which contains the XML data to convert
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the property which contains the XML data to convert | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: attrkey (值: None) - Prefix that is used to access the attributes
charkey (值: None) - Prefix that is used to access the character content
explicitArray (值: None) - Whether to always put child nodes in an array if true; otherwise an array is created only if there is more than one
explicitRoot (值: None) - Whether to set this if you want to get the root node in the resulting object
ignoreAttrs (值: None) - Whether to ignore all XML attributes and only create text nodes

mergeAttrs (值: None) - Whether to merge attributes and child elements as properties of the parent, instead of keying attributes off a child attribute object. This option is ignored if ignoreAttrs is true.
normalize (值: None) - Whether to trim whitespaces inside text nodes
normalizeTags (值: None) - Whether to normalize all tag names to lowercase
trim (值: None) - Whether to trim the whitespace at the beginning and end of text nodes
